statements: SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location, timestamp, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location, sensor_type, reading, timestamp, sensor_id FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensor_data WHERE location LIKE 'Room%' ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, location, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND reading BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC, location ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, location, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY location DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT AVG(reading) AS average_reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' GROUP BY location HAVING average_reading > 60
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS num_readings FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY num_readings DESC
SELECT location, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_location='Room A';
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING max_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM monitoring WHERE monitoring_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, monitoring_time, alert_type FROM sensors INNER JOIN monitoring ON sensors.sensor_id = monitoring.sensor_id ORDER BY monitoring_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location HAVING total_records > 5;
SELECT s.sensor_name, m.alert_type, m.error_message FROM sensors s JOIN monitoring m ON s.sensor_id = m.sensor_id WHERE m.monitoring_time >= '2021-01-01' AND m.monitoring_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value, MIN(sensor_value) AS min_value FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value, recorded_at FROM sensors WHERE recorded_at BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY recorded_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data_table;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data_table WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_location_table ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, status, last_updated FROM sensor_status_table WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data_table WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data_table WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_data_table JOIN sensor_location_table ON sensor_data_table.sensor_id = sensor_location_table.location_id;
SELECT sensor_name, status, last_updated FROM sensor_data_table JOIN sensor_status_table ON sensor_data_table.sensor_id = sensor_status_table.sensor_id WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data_table GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING AVG(sensor_value) > 25 ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_id, timestamp, reading FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE message LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM readings GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING total_readings > 10;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC, reading ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(reading) as max_reading FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Lab A' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT readings.sensor_id, sensors.sensor_name, AVG(value) as avg_value FROM readings JOIN sensors ON readings.sensor_id = sensors.sensor_id GROUP BY readings.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type, value FROM Sensors ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type, timestamp FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, timestamp, alert_message FROM Sensors JOIN SensorAlerts USING(sensor_id);
SELECT * FROM Sensors LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type, timestamp FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, value FROM Sensors WHERE value > 1000 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type, value, timestamp FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Room B' AND sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT s.sensor_id, s.location, st.type_name, sd.value FROM Sensors s JOIN SensorData sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id JOIN SensorTypes st ON s.sensor_type = st.type_name ORDER BY sd.value DESC
